param:
ffmpeg -format_code Hi59  -draw_bars 0  -f decklink -channels 2 -queue_size 400000000 -audio_depth 32 -i 'DeckLink Studio 4K' -pix_fmt yuv420p -vf yadif -c:v h264 -preset:v veryfast -tune zerolatency -b:v 2000k -bufsize 500k -c:a aac -f flv rtmp://127.0.0.1/live/enc2

-f flv rtmp://127.0.0.1/live/enc2
